name: BP Searchable Activity
author: Brajesh Singh

sections.description:
This plugin is deprecated and we won’t be able to provide support for it
BuddyPress Searchable Activity allows users to search BuddyPress activity. It is just a plug and play plugin.
Just activate it and it will add “Activity” as a drop down in the Site search filter(where you see posts, members etc).
Please see screenshots for more details.

Special Thanks to @imath for making it independent of any js modifications in the theme.

Please leave a comment on our blog BuddyDev for any support.

Others

Please leave a comment on our blog BuddyDev for any support.
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

e.g.

  1. Download the zip file
  2. Unzip it
  3. Upload bp-searchable-activity to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  4. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  5. Go ahead and check your website. You should see the Activity filter in BP search form
sections.faq:
No Questions, just solutions

Ok, we need some question first.
